Summary Note:
The RM is Krog Sørensen Lykke's brother-in-law, having married his's sister. This family connection has strengthened their professional collaboration, allowing for seamless communication and trust.
Krog Sørensen Lykke is a seasoned professional with over 38 years of experience.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Krog Sørensen Lykke has been happily married to Idun since 1988. Together they have 3 kids called Rasmussen, Idun and Sofia.
Education Background:
In 1981, Krog graduated from Slagelse Gymnasium with a secondary school diploma.
Krog completed his university studies at CBS International Business School in 1986.
Occupation History:
Krog Sørensen Lykke is a 61 year old and comes from Denmark.
In 1987, Krog Sørensen Lykke started working as a Hotel Manager at Radisson Hotel Group Danmark A/S, marking the beginning of his successful career.
In 1994, he moved to Radisson Hotel Group Danmark A/S to work as a General Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 3620000 DKK, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has house located in Ikast, worth 2340000 DKK.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns condo in Skanderborg worth 907000 DKK.

Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Næstved, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The flat is valued at 980000 DKK.

He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
